posts.post_title: FS: T206 Wiltse (2 Back Versions) and Pickering
posts.post_content:
Last price drop before headed to eBay, and I'd rather someone on the forum get these...

For Sale:
T206 Hooks Wiltse with Cap, Old Mill back $15
T206 Hooks Wiltse with Cap, Piedmont 350-460 Factory 25 $15
T206 Ollie Pickering, Polar Bear back $14

Or take all three for $40, plus shipping (below)

Add $2.50 shipping for 1, 2 or all 3 cards. Payment via Paypal (no fees) or Money Order.

Please PM or Email. Thanks for looking!
Prices lowered on all three cards. :)
Another price reduction for Friday the 13th!
